pr_title: 196 modify dep file creation update process

timeline.message: Introduce textDocumentSyncType to track the document sync status (opened, changed, closed)
Introduce document sync type with textDocumentSyncType enum

implement logic to check the document sync type and disable the dep file creation/update if the text document sync type is DID_CHANGE
update unit test to cover the scenario of different text document sync type DID_OPEN and DID_CHANGE

timeline.author: temanbrcom
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -31,15 +31,30 @@
 import java.util.ArrayList;
 import java.util.List;
 
+/**
+ * This class is responsible for run the syntax and semantic analysis of an input cobol document.
+ * Its run method is used by the service facade layer CobolLanguageEngineFacade
+ */

timeline.bodyText: the header on those files, you may skip it for now and I will change it tomorrow for the entire project
